All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BuildingInfo
BuildingInfo is class that stores trees of Location objects and allows storing and accessing them during current BuildingInfoApplication runtime.
BuildingInfoApplication
 
BuildingInfoController
BuildingInfoController class specifies REST mappings in BuildingInfoApplication.
CompoundLocation
CompoundLocation is a location that can store other objects that inherit Location as children in a tree.
Location
Location is abstract base class for all locations that should be represented as a tree.
LocationDeserializer
LocationDeserializer is a custom deserializer for Location class.
LocationView
LocationView class provides views for JsonView annotations.
LocationView.All
contains all information about all locations
LocationView.Area
contains id, name and area of location
LocationView.Basic
contains id and name of location
LocationView.Cube
contains id, name and cubature of location
LocationView.Heating
contains id, name and calculated average heating energy of location
LocationView.Lighting
contains id, name and calculated average lighting power of location
Room
Room is a location that represents leaf in a tree of Location objects.
